MathOp.MainDesc: Performs a simple mathematical operation with two operands
MathOp.Input1: First input of the operation below, can be Double, Integer Boolean and String
MathOp.Input2: Second input of the operation below, can be Double, Integer Boolean and String
MathOp.Operation: The following operators are definied: for double and integer values the following operations are definied "+": Output = Input1 + Input2 "-": Output = Input1 â€“ Input2 "*": Output = Input1 * Input2 "/": Output = Input1 / Input2 "RND": Output = Input1 + (Input2-Input1)*RND(1) "ABS": Output = ABS(Input1-Input2) "SIN": Output = Input2*SIN(Input1) "COS": Output = Input2*COS(Input1) "TAN": Output = Input2*TAN(Input1) "EXP": Output = Input2*EXP(Input1) "LN": Output = Input2*LN(Input1) "LOG": Output = Input2*LOG(Input1) "PWR": Output = Input2*PWR(Input1) "MOD": Ouput = Input1 MOD Input2 "DIV": Output = Input1 DIV Input2 for string values the following operations are possible "+": Output = Input1 + Input2 for boolean values the following operations are defined "NOT": Output = not(Input1) "AND": Output = Input1 AND Input2 "OR": Output = Input1 OR Input 2 "NAND": Output = NOT(Input1 AND Input2) "NOR": Output = NOT(Input1 OR Input2)
MathOp.Output: Attribute that contains the result of the above operation
